name: Tongly
description:
Tongly is a first person, 3D, platformer where you can't move around using your normal controls (WASD or the arrow keys).  Use the tongue of tongly to stick to objects and pull yourself to that object.

Tongly, the character you're playing, is the guardian of a planet far away. This planet has been invaded with small gathering robots, who are destroying the ecosystem by gathering the materials of the planet. Your job, as Tongly, is to destroy these robots by body-slamming them.

How to play
  • Download the File "Tongly.zip"
  • Extrude the .zip file
  • Open Tongly.exe
  • Enjoy the Game
Controls
  • 'WASD' to walk around (*Note: you walk really slow).
  • 'Left mouse' button to shoot the tongue. 
  • 'Left mouse' button to cancel the tongue, if shot.
  • 'Escape' to go back to the menu.

Made by Team 2

Joyce van der Zon - Artist & Programmer
